'''''Beyond Bree'' April 1981''' was the second issue of [[Beyond Bree]] published by the [[Tolkien Special Interest Group]].

==Contents==
* Song "Sir Celegwen"
* "Translating Poetry into Elvish" by N. Martsch
* Hobbit blue jade
* addresses of Tolkien newsletters
